channel.title: How do I make something open a file on your computer?
channel.description:
Title says it, basically...
So, I'm trying to make a CPanel or something, just sorta messing around and trying to learn, but how do I make a button, say, jStartServ, open a file on my C:\ drive? Like, in VisualBasic you can use the Shell(); command, or the Process.start();, but what do I put in to open a program/folder in Java?
I've looked everywhere, and all I can find is how to open a new Frame, which doesn't help me:|

item.title: How do I make something open a file on your computer?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Title says it, basically…

So, I’m trying to make a CPanel or something, just sorta messing around and trying to learn, but how do I make a button, say, jStartServ, open a file on my C:\ drive? Like, in VisualBasic you can use the Shell(); command, or the Process.start();, but what do I put in to open a program/folder in Java?

I’ve looked everywhere, and all I can find is how to open a new Frame, which doesn’t help me:|
